QuestData.Title: Safety in Numbers
QuestData.Description: I've taught you all that is practical for now.$B$BIt is time we joined with the other survivors. The others mentioned that King Greymane and his royal guard are just south of here.$B$BWe should go there and seek safety in numbers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane in the military district.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well in coming here. If we Gilneans stick together we might yet defeat this terrible enemy.
